info.title: Fitzwilliam Museum Collection Database API
info.description: Api for the Fitzwilliam Museum Collection Database

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated fields available to return, eg name,summary_title

get.summary: Retrieve objects and artworks ID numbers
get.description: A list of objects and artworks ID numbers recorded in the database

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query the system for objects and artworks (defaults to AND)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items returned per page

parameters.name: hasImage
parameters.description: Determine whether an object has images available

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Choose fields to return. Use a comma separated string. These can be any of the following without quotes: 'categories','description','component','department.value','identifier','inscription','lifecycle','institutions','multimedia','name','note','owners','publications','school_or_style','summary','techniques','measurements','title'. By default we return all fields.

parameters.name: hasGeo
parameters.description: Determine whether an object has geographic data available

parameters.name: hasIIIF
parameters.description: Determine whether an object has IIIF images available

parameters.name: collected_place
parameters.description: Findspot or location associated with acquisition

parameters.name: school_or_style
parameters.description: School or style associated with object

get.summary: Retrieve objects and artworks recorded in the database

parameters.name: query

parameters.name: hasImage

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Choose fields to return. Use a comma separated string. These can be any of the following without quotes: 'categories','description','component','department.value','identifier','inscription','lifecycle','institutions','multimedia','name','note','owners','publications','school_or_style','summary','techniques','measurements','title'. By default we return all fields.

parameters.name: hasGeo
parameters.description: Determine whether an object has geographic data available

parameters.name: hasIIIF
parameters.description: Determine whether an object has IIIF images available

parameters.description: Findspot or location associated with acquisition

parameters.name: school_or_style
parameters.description: School or style associated with object
